front.title: DRIP Entity Tag Authentication Formats & Protocols for Broadcast Remote ID

abstract.t: This document describes how to add trust into the Broadcast Remote ID (RID) specification discussed in the DRIP Architecture. It defines a few message schemes (sent within the Authentication Message) that can be used to authenticate past messages sent by a unmanned aircraft (UA) and provide proof of UA trustworthiness even in the absence of Internet connectivity at the receiving node.
